## Git.mkdir() method

Create a subdirectory `dir` in the repo dir with a callback.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mkdir(dir: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dir | string | directory name |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
